description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2014-2017. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Number of additional females benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Number of additional males benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Number of additional people benefitting from UNDP's livelihoods interventions
Number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for men 15+ years old
Number of new full-time equivalent jobs created for women 15+ years old
Total number of new full-time equivalent jobs created
Extent to which policies, systems and/or institutional measures are in place at the national and sub-national levels to generate and strengthen employment and livelihoods
Number of additional advocacy and knowledge schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional demonstration schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional implementation support schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
Number of additional skill-building schemes which expand and diversify the productive base, based on the use of sustainable production technologies
